title: User Registration with Email and Password
description: Verify that a user can register successfully using a valid email and password, including email verification step.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Input valid email and strong password
Submit registration form
Check that confirmation email is sent
Verify email via confirmation link
Confirm user is registered and can login

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check login is successful when a user inputs valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email and password
Click login button
Validate that user is redirected to dashboard

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login fails gracefully with incorrect email or password inputs.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter incorrect email or password
Click login button
Check that login is rejected and error message shown

title: OAuth Login Using Google Provider
description: Validate that users can login using OAuth with Google account and are redirected correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Click 'Login with Google' button
Complete Google OAuth authentication
Verify user session is created and dashboard is displayed

title: Multi-Factor Authentication Enforcement
description: Check that multi-factor authentication (MFA) process is triggered and required after login if enabled.

steps.description: Login with email/password for a user with MFA enabled
Verify MFA prompt appears
Enter valid MFA token
Confirm successful access to user dashboard

title: Create Family Group and Assign Owner Role
description: Ensure a user can create a family group which makes them the owner role with full permissions.

steps.description: Login as a registered user
Navigate to family management and create new family
Provide required information and submit
Verify family group is created and user role is owner

title: Invite Family Member With Roles and Permissions
description: Check that an owner or admin can invite a member specifying roles (admin, member, viewer) and that invite emails are generated.

steps.description: Login as family owner
Navigate to family management and invite new member with role selection
Verify invitation email is sent to the invited member
Invited user accepts invitation
Confirm user is added to family with correct role permissions

title: Role-Based Permission Enforcement for Viewing Transactions
description: Validate that users with different roles have appropriate access to view or modify financial data.

steps.description: Login as viewer role member
Attempt to add or edit transactions
Verify that write actions are denied
Attempt to view transactions and budgets
Confirm read access is allowed

title: Add Bank Account with Validations
description: Ensure users can add multiple bank accounts with proper validation of inputs (account number, bank name, currency).

steps.description: Login and navigate to financial management
Go to bank accounts section and add a new account
Input valid bank account details and submit
Verify the account is listed and saved correctly
Try to submit invalid details (e.g., empty account number)
Confirm validation errors are shown preventing submission

title: Register and Categorize Transaction Automatically
description: Test that when a transaction is registered, the system automatically categorizes it and allows manual override if required.

steps.description: Login and navigate to transactions
Add a new transaction with known merchant and amount
Verify the transaction is auto-categorized correctly
Edit the transaction and change the category manually
Confirm the new category is saved

title: Monthly Budget Spending Alert and Projection
description: Check that the monthly family budget updates spending in real-time and triggers alert when spending approaches or exceeds thresholds.

steps.description: Set a monthly budget for family
Add transactions to increase spending near threshold
Verify spending alert is shown to appropriate users
Review spending projections on dashboard
Confirm projections reflect current spending trends

title: Import Financial Data from Excel and CSV with Mapping
description: Validate that users can import financial transactions from Excel/CSV files and that the system intelligently maps data fields automatically.

steps.description: Login and navigate to import/export section
Upload a sample Excel file with financial transactions
Verify fields are auto-mapped appropriately
Finalize import process
Confirm imported transactions appear correctly categorized

title: Export Data to Excel and Generate PDF Report
description: Ensure that users can export their financial data to Excel files and generate PDF reports, validating completeness and formatting.

steps.description: Navigate to export section
Request export of transactions to Excel
Verify Excel file is downloaded and contains correct data
Generate PDF report for selected time range
Confirm PDF report is created and contains graphs and summaries

title: Responsive UI Behavior on Desktop and Mobile Devices
description: Test that the application UI adapts correctly to different screen sizes and supports light and dark modes with accessibility compliance.

steps.description: Open the app on desktop browser and resize window
Verify UI elements adapt fluidly with no overlap or cut-offs
Switch to dark mode
Confirm UI color scheme changes appropriately
Open the app on mobile viewport
Check that navigation and menus adjust suitably for mobile, including PWA installation option
Run accessibility audit checking WCAG 2.1 AA compliance

title: Row Level Security (RLS) Enforcement in Data Access
description: Verify that database RLS policies prevent unauthorized data access according to user roles.

steps.description: Login as member with limited permissions
Attempt to query financial data belonging to other families or unauthorized accounts
Verify queries are denied or return empty results
Login as family owner
Query family-specific data
Confirm full access allowed as per role

title: Audit Trail Logging for Transactions and Family Management
description: Check that changes to transactions and family roles trigger audit records with relevant metadata.

steps.description: Make a transaction addition, edit, and deletion
Change family member roles or invite new member
Verify audit logs capture user, timestamp, and changes

title: Input Validation Using Zod Schema
description: Ensure all user inputs such as registration, transaction entry, and budget creation enforce proper validation rules and reject invalid data.

steps.description: Attempt to submit forms with missing required fields
Check validation errors block submission
Try inputs with invalid formats (email, negative numbers, invalid dates)
Confirm validation messages appear accordingly

title: Performance Testing for Dashboard Load
description: Validate that the dashboard loads financial data, reports, and analytics within target performance thresholds under simulated load conditions.

steps.description: Simulate login under normal and high concurrency
Load dashboard and analytics components
Measure response times and confirm they meet defined SLAs

title: Session Management and Route Protection
description: Test that authenticated sessions persist appropriately and unauthorized users cannot access protected routes.

steps.description: Login and navigate several authenticated pages
Close and reopen browser to verify session persistence
Confirm session remains active and user stays logged in
Try to directly access protected routes without authentication
Verify redirection to login page

title: Family Financial Goals Collaborative Management
description: Ensure family members with appropriate permissions can create, view, edit, and mark financial goals as achieved.

steps.description: Login as family admin
Create shared financial goal with target amount and deadline
Verify goal appears in dashboard and progress can be tracked
Invite family member to view and contribute
Login as family member and update goal progress
Confirm updates are reflected in analytics for all members
